name: Got Guts? (SuperKowai)
description:
Got Guts is a small project I did for my Game Design College course. It is a bullet-hell based shooter with a concept vaguely deriving from a perspective of crew members exploring the inside of a human body. 

Please give feedback and enjoy! :)

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Rapid Fire (can be held down)

X - Special Attack (limited supply)

Known bugs:

-Sometimes the items that effect the bullet type won't take effect or may take effect  for only a few instances.

-Replaying the game after dying will not stop the music from the previous run which    will continue playing even after the you've started a new run.
